<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create event type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a single event type category. Use this to add new classifications for events and to control visibility via the scope setting.

**Workflow Example**
1. Build an `UpdateEventTypeRequest` with `Name`, `Scope`, and optional `Icon`/`SiteId`.
2. Create type: [POST /api/v1.0/events/types](/docs/api/events/create-event-type).
3. Use the returned `EventTypeId` when creating events.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `Name` and `Scope` (plus optional `SiteId`/`Icon`).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request model for creating or updating an event type.","properties":{"EventTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Event type ID (required for updates)."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for site-specific event types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["All","System","Global","Site","App","User","Role","Team"],"description":"Visibility scope of the event type."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the event type."},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Icon identifier for the event type."}},"title":"UpdateEventTypeRequest"},"example":{"SiteId":null,"Scope":"Global","Name":"Conference","Icon":"calendar-check"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Item created.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing a single event type.","properties":{"Item":{"type":"object","description":"Event type/category for categorizing events.","properties":{"EventTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the event type."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date when the event type was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date when the event type was last modified."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the event type is deleted (soft delete)."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for site-specific event types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["All","System","Global","Site","App","User","Role","Team"],"description":"Visibility scope of the event type."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the event type."},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Icon identifier for the event type."}},"title":"EventType"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"EventTypeItemResponse"}}}}}}
>
